Serialized Form

  • Package main

    • Class main.CarPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • aiSelector

          javax.swing.JComboBox aiSelector
          Combo-box used to select the AI for the car.

        • carColor

          javax.swing.JButton carColor
          Button used to cycle through available car colors.

        • id

          int id
          The ID of the CarPanel.

        • playerName

          javax.swing.JTextField playerName
          The text-field for the user to input the name of the player.

        • remove

          javax.swing.JButton remove
          Button used to remove the CarPanel. (And remove the car by doing so.)

    • Class main.Game extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • activeCar

          Car activeCar
          The Car currently on turn.

        • activeCarIndex

          int activeCarIndex
          The index of the Car currently on turn.

        • back

          javax.swing.JButton back
          Button used to go back to the menu.

        • cars

          Car[] cars
          An array containing all Cars.

        • carsFinished

          int carsFinished
          The number of cars which have finished the race.

        • ch

          CrosshairTile[][] ch
          2D array of CrosshairTiles forming the crosshair used to get input from human players.

        • checkpoints

          Checkpoint[] checkpoints
          An array containing all Checkpoints.

        • controls

          javax.swing.JLabel controls
          Displays instructions on how to control the game.

        • hideScore

          javax.swing.JButton hideScore
          Button used to hide the score panel.

        • map

          Map map
          The instance of the Map used in the game.

        • nextAiMove

          int[] nextAiMove
          Used to store the next move an AI wants to make.

        • scoreMainPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel scoreMainPanel
          Contains instances of ScorePanel displaying the post-game score of players.

        • scoreScrollPane

          javax.swing.JScrollPane scoreScrollPane
          Used to be able to scroll in the scoreMainPanel.

        • showScore

          javax.swing.JButton showScore
          Button used to show the score panel again after it has been hidden.

        • stop

          boolean stop
          Used to stop the car from moving further. (E.g. after it crashed into a wall.)

        • tileSize

          int tileSize
          Current size of one tile. All in-game components calculate their size from this value. Is altered to zoom in and out.

        • turn

          int turn
          Stores the current turn.

        • turnLabel

          javax.swing.JLabel turnLabel
          Displays the current turn.

        • waitingForEnter

          boolean waitingForEnter
          Is true when next AI move is stored and the game is waiting for the user to confirm it or if the active car is on ICE and the game is waiting fot he user to confirm its move.

    • Class main.ScorePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • aiName

          javax.swing.JLabel aiName
          Displays the name of the AI if there was one controlling the car.

        • place

          javax.swing.JLabel place
          Displays how has the player placed in the race.

        • playerName

          javax.swing.JLabel playerName
          Displays the name of the player.

        • turnCount

          javax.swing.JLabel turnCount
          Displays the number of turns it took to the player to finish the race.

  • Package model

    • Class model.Car extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • aiName

          java.lang.String aiName
          The name of the AI controlling this car if there is one.

        • color

          Car.Color color
          The color of the car.

        • coordinates

          int[] coordinates
          The coordinates at which is the car currently located.

        • crashCountdown

          int crashCountdown
          Stores the value of how many turn has the car to wait before continuing the race because it has crashed.

        • crashed

          boolean crashed
          Is true if the car has crashed and has to skip turns as punishment.

        • driver

          DriverAI driver
          The AI controlling the car if there is one.

        • finished

          boolean finished
          Is true if the car has finished the race.

        • game

          Game game
          The game of which is the car component.

        • playerName

          java.lang.String playerName
          The name of the player controlling this car.

        • sunk

          boolean sunk
          Is true if the car has sunk into water and is no longer able to continue the race.

        • velocity

          int[] velocity
          The vector representing the current velocity of the car.

    • Class model.CrosshairTile extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • game

          Game game
          The game of which is the crosshair component.

        • index

          int[] index
          The index of the crosshair tile representing which tile of the crosshair it is.

        • isNextAiMove

          boolean isNextAiMove
          Is true if this crosshair tile corresponds to the next move of the AI on turn and is to be highlighted.

        • mouseOver

          boolean mouseOver
          Is true if the mouse is positioned over this crosshair tile.

        • x

          int x
          The coordinate of the crosshair tile.

        • y

          int y
          The coordinate of the crosshair tile.

    • Class model.Map extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • game

          Game game
          The game of which the map is component.

        • mapTile

          Tile[][] mapTile
          The array containing the tile types of all tiles.

        • start

          int[] start
          The coordinates of the start.

        • tileHeight

          int tileHeight
          The size of the map.

        • tileWidth

          int tileWidth
          The size of the map.

  • Package util

    • Class util.MapFormatException extends java.lang.Exception implements Serializable
